title: The Ripple Chapter
description: The Ripple Chapter is a online competition platform that organises competitions in the fields of architecture design, product design, photography and so on.

title: Gatha Events Pvt Ltd
description: Gatha - A Tale of Events is an event management company. The website showcases their portfolio, and their team.

title: Wingrow Agritech Pvt Ltd
description: Wingrow Agritech connects farmers to consumers by delivering fresh, organic farm produce directly to your doorstep.

title: TEDxVITPune 2018
description: TEDxVITPune is an independently organised TED event with the mission is to learn, share and discuss “Ideas. Worth Spreading” that have the power and potential to make a difference.

title: VITPuneMUN 2019
description: VITPuneMUN is a student simulation of the United Nations. Students take on the role of delegates of nations in different UN bodies and debate on the agendas of their respective committees.

title: VishwaConclave
description: VishwaConclave is a student-centric conference organized by the students of VIT, Pune focused on curating an inspirational dialogue from exemplary orators.

title: Events Planning & Execution Committee
subtitle: Web Scraping, Flask API, React Frontend
description: EPEC is the team behind the successful execution of extracurricular events conducted in Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune.

title: Vishwakarandak, VIT Pune
description: Vishwakarandak is the three-day long, annual, interdepartmental fest organized by the Event Planning and Execution Committee in Vishwakarma Institute of Technology

title: Mélange, VIT Pune
description: Mélange is the annual intercollegiate fest organized by Vishwakarma Institute of Technology,Pune, is a fest with over 200 events and more than 5000 participants.
